headline: Franklin to Integrate Wamco Amid SEC Investigation & Heavy Outflows
summary: BEN is set to integrate Wamco into its larger operations as the unit faces massive outflows, the SEC probe and internal challenges.

headline: The $55 Billion Customer Exodus Rocking Franklin Templeton
summary: The Justice Department and other federal agencies are investigating trades by Wamco’s star fund manager.
